name: Form Fields Component
description:
Just a form field component with the following variants:-

  • Open Text Input Field
  • Dropdown Field
  • Calendar Field
  • Phone Field with country code
  • Open field with Icon on left


Style Variants

  • Outline, Underline with Minimal and Filled versions
  • With Field Label
  • Contained


Made with Auto-Layout

-----------------------------------------

Update 1.01 --- Changelog---

-----------------------------------------

  • 2 New Field Styles
  • Updated text styles for error states
